verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>. <S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>, And his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H2623>saints<s%>.
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in him that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1121>him<s%>: Let the children of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in their <S%H4428>King<s%>.
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H4234>dance<s%>: Let them sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto him with <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> taketh <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in his <S%H5971>people<s%>: He will <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H6035>meek<s%> with <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
Let the <S%H2623>saints<s%> <S%H5937>exult<s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%>: Let them sing for <S%H5937>joy<s%> upon their <S%H4904>beds<s%>.
Let the <S%H7319>high<s%> praises of <S%H410>God<s%> be in their <S%H1627>mouth<s%>, And a <S%H6374>two-edged<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>;
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, And <S%H8433>punishments<s%> upon the <S%H3816>peoples<s%>;
To <S%H631>bind<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H2131>chains<s%>, And their <S%H3513>nobles<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>;
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> upon them the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%>: This <S%H1926>honor<s%> have all his <S%H2623>saints<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
